name: Y E L L O W - J A C K E T | イエロージャケット
name_original: Y E L L O W - J A C K E T | イエロージャケット
description:
Gameplay footage provided by Indie Games Club

The single mechanic used:

 "Move the player to dodge bullets and shoot enemies". 

The closest enemy near you will make you automatically shoot towards it. This forces the player to move around the screen a lot instead of in traditional shmup/bullet hells where you tap-move.

Y E L L O W - J A C K E T | イエロージャケット (or just yellow jacket) is a vaporwave arcade shoot-em-up about a motorcyclist running from the government in this classic 80s style arcade shmup! Can you get the highest score?

Keyboard Move - [WASD] or [ARROW KEYS] Jump - [SPACE] Speed up/down - [SHIFT] Exit - [ESC] Gamepad Move - Left stick / Dpad Jump - Y Speed up/down - [ Right Trigger Bottom] Exit - Start

This game is still in development. Make sure to follow me here on itch.io or twitter to keep updated with the progress! Check in for updates on this project as well for I will be posting devlogs about it! 

Also please make sure to rate and comment! Your feedback is so valuable and important to the success and fun of this project! Thank you sooo much! :D
